name: redux-micro-frontend
description: This is a library for using Redux to managing state for self-contained apps in a Micro-Frontend architecture. Each self-contained isolated app can have its own isolated and decoupled Redux store. The componentized stores interact with a global store for enabling cross-application communication.

scripts.release:pre: npm run build && npm version prerelease && npm run copyfiles:publish-beta
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run copyfiles:publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm run copyfiles:publish
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm run copyfiles:publish
scripts.copyfiles:publish: npm run copy:packagejson && npm run copy:npmrc && cd lib && npm publish
scripts.copyfiles:publish-beta: npm run copy:packagejson && npm run copy:npmrc && cd lib && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm i && npm build
